abilities.name: Magnetic Call
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Metal Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Beldum is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Metal Charge
attacks.text: Put 1 damage counter on Beldum.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.text: If Beldum has any Energy attached to it, Beldum's Retreat Cost is 0.

abilities.name: Magnetic Call
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Metal Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Beldum is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Metal Charge
attacks.text: Put 1 damage counter on Beldum.

data.name: Beldum

attacks.name: Core Beam
attacks.text: Discard a Metal Energy from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Its cells are all magnets. It uses magnetism to communicate with others of its kind.

data.name: Beldum

attacks.name: Single Smash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

data.flavorText: The magnetic force generated by its body repels the ground's natural magnetism, letting it float.

data.name: Beldum

attacks.name: Reaction
attacks.text: You may switch Beldum with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

data.flavorText: The magnetic force generated by its body repels the ground's natural magnetism, letting it float.

data.name: Beldum
data.flavorText: It converses with others by magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.

data.name: Beldum

attacks.name: Calculate
attacks.text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck and put them back on top of your deck in any order.

data.flavorText: Its cells are all magnetic, and it communicates with others by using magnetic pulses.

attacks.name: Magnetic Lines
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, move a basic Energy card from the Defending Pokémon to another of your opponent's Pokémon. (Ignore this effect if your opponent has only 1 Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Flip Over
attacks.text: Beldum does 10 damage to itself, and don't apply Weakness and Resistance to this damage.

abilities.name: Conductive Body
abilities.text: As long as Beldum is your Active Pokémon, you pay Colorless less to retreat Beldum for each Beldum on your Bench.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.text: Beldum does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Metal Ball
attacks.text: Put 1 damage counter on the Defending Pokémon.

data.name: Beldum

abilities.name: Metal Chain
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you attach a Metal Energy card from your hand to Beldum (excluding effects of attacks or Poké-Powers), you may search your deck for Beldum and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Beldum is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.text: Beldum does 10 damage to itself.

data.flavorText: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.

data.name: Beldum

attacks.name: Core Beam
attacks.text: Discard a Metal Energy from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Its cells are all magnets. It uses magnetism to communicate with others of its kind.

data.name: Beldum

attacks.name: Allure
attacks.text: Draw a card.

data.flavorText: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.

data.name: Beldum

abilities.name: Conductive Body
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, its Retreat Cost is Colorless less for each Beldum on your Bench.

data.flavorText: With magnetic traction, it pulls its opponents in close. When they're in range, it slashes them with its rear claws.

data.name: Beldum

attacks.name: Single Smash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

data.flavorText: With magnetic traction, it pulls its opponents in close. When they're in range, it slashes them with its rear claws.

data.name: Beldum

attacks.name: Pit Search
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Stadium card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

data.flavorText: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.

data.name: Beldum

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

data.flavorText: If you anger it, it will do more than rampage. It will also burst out strong magnetism, causing nearby machines to break.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Metal Ball
attacks.text: Put 1 damage counter on the Defending Pokémon.

data.name: Beldum

attacks.name: Magnetic Lift
attacks.text: Search your deck for a card. Shuffle your deck, then put that card on top of it.

data.flavorText: From its rear, Beldum emits a magnetic force that rapidly pulls opponents in. They get skewered on Beldum's sharp claws.

data.name: Beldum

attacks.name: Iron Tackle
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

data.flavorText: From its rear, Beldum emits a magnetic force that rapidly pulls opponents in. They get skewered on Beldum's sharp claws.

data.name: Beldum
data.flavorText: The magnetic force generated by its body repels the ground's natural magnetism, letting it float.
